snippet: John Cameron Mitchell stars in “Hedwig and the Angry Inch” on Broadway, in a part he has played elsewhere and in the movie.
abstract: John Cameron Mitchell prepares to take stage in Broadway production of Hedwig and the Angry Inch, musical he created in 1990s; he has not played role in years and must follow Tony Award-winning performance by Neil Patrick Harris.
lead_paragraph: John Cameron Mitchell stars in “Hedwig and the Angry Inch” on Broadway, in a part he has played elsewhere and in the movie.

headline.seo: John Cameron Mitchell Stars in ‘Hedwig and the Angry Inch’ on Broadway
headline.main: An Old Role, but New Tresses
headline.print_headline: An Old Role, but New Tresses
